Name: VR Dragon Flight
About the game: In 'VR Dragon Flight', players will play as a dragon warrior, driving a flying dragon to soar in the air. This is a VR tour game that focuses on leisure and relaxation. Players can freely control the direction and speed of flying by using the controller. There are senses of Chinese martial arts scene with mountains and so on. Experience the thrill of flying through the clouds. Stop at any time to enjoy the beautiful view. Instructions: The touchpad of the left controller is for adjusting flying speed. The touchpad of the right controller is for adjusting flying direction.
